policiesWorkflowDescription: Review and finalize imported policies through the workflow process
noPoliciesInWorkflowDescription: No policies requiring attention or in processing stage
policyWorkflowStagesDescription: Policies go through these stages before being finalized
reviewImportedPolicyAndFinalizeIt: Review the imported policy and finalize it when ready
manageWorkflowStatusOfPolicy: Manage the workflow status of this policy
followingFieldsAreRequired: The following fields are required to proceed
ensureAllRequiredInformationIsComplete: Ensure all required information is complete before proceeding
completeAllRequiredFieldsToProgress: Complete all required fields to progress. Some data from the imported policy may require manual verification or correction.
